feed.subtitle: A RSS feed containing the latest articles published in The Linguistic Review

entry.title: Non-active voices in Iranian languages: the case of Farsi, Kurdish and Baxtiari
entry.summary: Article by Gholamhosein Karimi Doostan, Atefeh Shabazi DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2001

entry.title: The negative indefinitenuddu‘no one’ as a floating quantifier in Sicilian
entry.summary: Article by Silvio Cruschina DOI: https://doi.org/10.1515/tlr-2025-2002

entry.title: Resultative properties of stage-level predicates in Catalan: a study of perfective adjectives

entry.title: The typology of the distributional restrictions of a feature: occlusion and bipositionality
